caseTitle:
M/S Al-Mahmudia (Pvt) Ltd.
VERSUS
Pakistan through Secretary M/O Housing & Works, Islamabad etc.
tagline: The Court approves the view taken by a larger Bench of this Court in the case of Federation of Pakistan v. Muhammad Tariq Pirzada (1999 SCMR 2744) that hearing before Section Officer is sufficient to meet the requirements of Article 32 of the Establishment of the Office of Wafaqi Mohtasib (Ombudsman) Order, 1983 (President's Order 1 of 1983).
